pr_title: BAEL-3971: Generate DDL script in Spring

timeline.message: BAEL-3971: Generate DDL script in Spring

timeline.bodyText: Should these be private rather than package-private?
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

replies.bodyText:
From "baeldung - for authors - 2 - code in the article" I understood it was advised to use package scope ("use package-scope access modifier if possible").
Nevertheless, I modified to use the private access modifier.
replies.author: eardeleanu15

timeline.bodyText: These are all commented out - should you leave a comment showing what the settings are and when to uncomment them?
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,4 +2,12 @@ spring.jpa.show-sql=true
 #MySql
 #spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/baeldung
 #spring.datasource.username=baeldung
-#spring.datasource.password=baeldung
\ No newline at end of file
+#spring.datasource.password=baeldung
+#spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
+#spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL57Dialect
+
+#JPA-Schema-Generation
+#spring.jpa.properties.javax.persistence.schema-generation.scripts.action=create
+#spring.jpa.properties.javax.persistence.schema-generation.scripts.create-target=create.sql
+#spring.jpa.properties.javax.persistence.schema-generation.scripts.create-source=metadata
+#spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true

timeline.bodyText: Out of interest, would it make more sense to switch to H2? then the user can run the examples without having to standup a MySql server
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,4 +2,12 @@ spring.jpa.show-sql=true
 #MySql
 #spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/baeldung
 #spring.datasource.username=baeldung
-#spring.datasource.password=baeldung
\ No newline at end of file
+#spring.datasource.password=baeldung
+#spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
+#spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL57Dialect

replies.bodyText: I've continued to use MySql because it was previously used in the configuration, but since it was commented I've changed it now to H2
replies.author: eardeleanu15

timeline.bodyText: Let's add a line break inside the {}
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
